alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Powell, central Estill and northwestern Lee Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Irvine, or over Irvine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Willow Tree, Cow Creek, Cottage Furnace and Doe Creek around 405 PM EDT. Pitts around 410 PM EDT. Fitchburg, Pryse, Texola, Furnace and Knowlton around 415 PM EDT. Cobhill, Shade, Rogers Chapel and Evelyn around 420 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Patsey, Crystal, Pilot, Old Landing, Pinnacle, Greeley, See, Whynot and Willow Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
